titleStmt.title: By the Quene the Quenes Maiestie consyderyng the returne of no small numbers of her faythfull subiectes, hauyng truely and valiauntly serued at Newhauen, and beyng many of the same sicke ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, printers to the Queenes Maiestie,
publicationStmt.pubPlace: Imprinted at London in Powles Church yarde :
